Download data catalog of Our World in Data

Source: R/owid_get_catalog.R
owid_get_catalog.Rd

Downloads the data catalog of Our World in Data (OWID) hosted on Datasette.

Usage

owid_get_catalog(snake_case = TRUE)

Arguments

snake_case

Logical. If TRUE (default), converts column names to lowercase.

Value

A tibble containing the OWID catalog.

Examples

# \donttest{
# Download a full table
owid_get_catalog()
#> # A tibble: 5,012 × 18
#>       id slug     type  config created_at updated_at last_edited_at published_at

#>  3  7966 militar… Line… "{\"i… 2024-07-3… 2024-07-3… 2024-07-30 12… ""          
#>  4  7965 militar… Line… "{\"i… 2024-07-3… 2024-07-3… 2024-07-31 08… "2024-07-30…
